title: Gif It To Me
description: A multiplayer, interactive board game that challenges players to write the funniest or most clever caption for a selection of animated gifs.

title: Trail Mix
description: Web application that locates nearest cycling trails based on user input, then automatically locates the restaurants that are closest to the end of the trail.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Web application that shows current and future weather conditions for any user-selected city, in addition to saving previous user inputs.

title: Template Engine
description: CLI that takes in information about a team within a company and generates an HTML output containing said information.

title: Password Generator
description: Web application that generates a random password based on user input.

title: Profile Generator
description: CLI that takes a Github username and produces a PDF template with that user's information.
